Title: General Line propaganda poster 3 -- It is the General Line of the Party's socialist construction to go all out, aim high and achieve greater, faster, better and more economical results in building socialism
Designer: Shen Meifang (沈梅芳)Tang Baijun (唐佰钧)Shen Fan (沈凡)
Publisher: Shanghai huapian chubanshe (上海画片出版社)
Notes: The arrow mimicks an airplane taking off. The four characters doubling as the aircraft's engines stand for "More, Faster, Better, More economical" (duo, kuai, hao, sheng 多，快，好，省), a Great Leap Forward slogan.
